title: The Wives of Wall Street
description: They were on top of the world until the financial crisis struck and they flamed out. That’s when their wives got busy taking over.
quote: Don’t let anyone stop you from getting what you want!
alt1: Penelope looking at a model’s outfit
alt2: Margo speaking to her son who looks defeated
alt3: another woman getting a finger pointed in her face
alt4: Colette on the phone in her office
